Mirrorcle PicoAmp¶

class picoAmp.PicoAmp(name, labjack, parent=None)¶

Bases: archetypes.node.Device

Device driver for the Mirrorcle PicoAmp board.

__init__(name, labjack, parent=None)¶

Initialize the Device for use.

_actuate(state)¶

Updates MEMS to a target state. Axes not included in the state dict are unaffected.

_connect()¶

Initializes the PicoAmp via SPI.

_initialize()¶

Initializes the DAC and sets the bias voltage on all four channels to 80 V.

command(cmd)¶

Separates the bitstring cmd into a series of bytes and sends them through the SPI.

digital(V)¶

Converts an analog voltage V to a 16-bit string for the DAC

setDifferential(V, axis)¶

Sets a target differential voltage V=HV_A-HV_B if axis is 'X' or V=HV_C-HV_D if axis is 'Y'. For example, if V=2 and axis is 'X', this sets HV_A=81 and HV_2=79. Allowed range of V is -80 to 80.
